name: Invisible Labyrinth
description:
Roll a marble in a labyrinth with some invisible walls.

Game Jam

  • Name : "Potat0s Game Jam Spéciale : 4 heures de cuisson"
  • Date : October 2021
  • Duration : 4 hours
  • Theme : "Invisible"

Description

This is a classic "roll a marble in a labyrinth" type of game.

Just make your way inside the labyrinth and roll the ball into the hole.

The game starts immediately in the first level, there are 5 levels, once level 5 is finished, you loop into the first level again. You can loop indefinitely.

Known bug : When you loop, another instance of the music will start on top of the existing music. I guess it's a New Game + bonus now.

Controls

  • Arrows/WASD : Move the ball
  • Escape : Quit the game

Credits

  • Engine : Unity
  • 3D modeling : ProBuilder
  • Texture : Wood, Ball texture
  • Music :
    • Funky Chunk Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
